DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate long-term safety tolerability cariprazine adjunctive treatment antidepressant therapy ( ADT ) patient Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) .
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Long-term Safety Tolerability Cariprazine Adjunctive Treatment Antidepressant Therapy ( ADT ) Patients With Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD )
DOC.criteria: Patients provide consent prior study specific procedure Meet DSMIVTR criterion MDD New patient must ongoing inadequate response protocol allow ADTs report Antidepressant Treatment Response Questionnaire ( ATRQ ) For rollover patient RGHMD72 , completion Study RGHMD72 ( either doubleblind singleblind treatment period ) continue ADT treatment . Patients meet DSMIVTR criterion MDD
